dlentry.dt: A pipeline fails to start with the following validation error:

dd.codeblock: IPC_DEST_15 Could not connect to any SDC RPC destination : [<host name>: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused]

dlentry.dd: You configured the pipeline to write error records to a pipeline, but the configuration information for the error records pipeline is invalid.
To write error records to a pipeline, you need a valid destination pipeline that includes an RPC origin.
